text: [Ej pajomʙar] Bad-in son turo ʙajni ummate firistodem, ki pes az onho ummathoe omada [va rafta] ʙudand, to on ci ʙar tu vahj kardaem, ʙar onon ʙixoni va hol on ki onon ʙa [Parvardigori] rahmon kufr mevarzand. Bigu: «U Parvardigori man ast [va] ma'ʙude [ʙarhaq] cuz U nest. Bar U tavakkal kardam va ʙozgastam ʙa suji Ust»
